title: Cannot login

labels.name: E:Desktop DB Improvement
labels.description: Add a dedicated db for wallet

milestone.description:
Milestone cycles:

[Cycle 1](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+milestone%3A0.14+label%3AC1): 7 July
[Cycle 2](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+milestone%3A0.14+label%3AC2): 28 July 
[Cycle 3](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+milestone%3A0.14+label%3AC3): 18 August


**--- Main focus ---**

**1. Token permissions to enable control of community smart contracts**
- Before a community founder can use any of the community token admin functionality, they first have to deploy Owner and Token Master contracts.
- This work involves: new empty state screen for Mint and Airdrop tokens (before current empty state screen is revealed), new flow for deploying the community's Owner and Token Master contracts in a single step, a fixed uneditable permission giving anybody who holds the Token Master token admin rights for the community should be automatically created.
- Only the holder of the single Owner token can access the Token Master airdrop, remote destruct, and view holders functions. Anybody who holds the Token Master token can access all token admin options, excluding those related to the Token Master token itself, as well as being and Admin of the community.
- This will all be explained in more detail in the designs.

Backend Epic: https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/11249

**2. Update Community Admin home screen inc control node transfer and associated dialogues**
- Remove ability for a Owner to leave a community on the computer that's running as that community's control node
- Community Admin home screen cleanup (inc. adding at least one of the three graphs, whichever is easiest to implement).
  - Graph issue: https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/11152  
  - Community overview: https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/11278

**3. Ability for user to select & manage accounts shared with each community control node**
- This item is quite a bit of work
- Touches Community settings, as well as all of the community join flows
- Backend issues: 
  - Join API: https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/11154
  - Edit API: https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/11153

**4. Encryption for token gated channels that are inside Open (not token gated) communities**
[#10998](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/10998)

**5. Final screens and bits and bobs needed prior to public beta**
- Modal that's shown every time after login, reminding user's that Status Desktop is in Beta [#11044](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/11044)
- The bug with 'requests to join' a community not constantly arriving, or sometimes arriving after a delay, must be fixed. [#8264](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/8264)
- Anything that didn't get completed in 0.13 related to new share URL format
- All the outstanding bugs and small items that got pushed into the 0.14 milestone.


**--- Things that we SHOULD NOT work on during the 0.14 cycle ---**
- Messaging and UI teams shouldn't work on perf. in 0.14 (but Wallet team should!)
- Anything big mutual contacts related, other than fixing small bugs we find like #10497 #10498 #11120 #11121  (hopefully this functionality working good enough now!)

**--- Wallet Team ---**

1. Finish any outstanding work related to Activity screens (top priority - aim to have complete by July 14th)

2. Updated Wallet Settings screens UI inc. account syncing functionality  *Synced information should immediately be reflected in the UI after it is received (sometimes synced info is currently only displayed after the next app restart, this needs to be fixed)*

3. Wallet performance and memory consumption optimisations

4. Fix bugs, clean up loose ends (to get things in a good state before the work on the Mobile wallet starts)

body:
# Bug Report

## Description

Cannot login anymore. Getting "incorrect password" when I know it's correct (using a password manager).


Logs:

```
▶ ~/.local/bin/StatusIm-Desktop-230821-200320-7274e6-x86_64.AppImage
INFO [08-22|16:53:26.189] Status backend initialized               backend=geth version=0.163.11 commit=3bf0bed78 IpfsGatewayURL=https://ipfs.status.im/
Info: Warning: Ignoring XDG_SESSION_TYPE=wayland on Gnome. Use QT_QPA_PLATFORM=wayland to run on Wayland anyway. (:0, )
INF 2023-08-22 16:53:27.438+10:00 Version: 0.9.90                            topics="status-app" tid=103272 file=nim_status_client.nim:189
INF 2023-08-22 16:53:27.439+10:00 Commit: 7274e6156                          topics="status-app" tid=103272 file=nim_status_client.nim:190
INF 2023-08-22 16:53:27.439+10:00 Current date:                              topics="status-app" tid=103272 file=nim_status_client.nim:191 currentDateTime=2023-08-22T16:53:27+10:00
INF 2023-08-22 16:53:27.439+10:00 starting application controller...         topics="status-app" tid=103272 file=nim_status_client.nim:193
INF 2023-08-22 16:53:36.595+10:00 starting application...                    topics="status-app" tid=103272 file=nim_status_client.nim:196
WRN 2023-08-22 16:53:36.596+10:00 Error decoding signal                      topics="signals-manager" tid=103272 file=signals_manager.nim:43 err="Unknown signal received: mediaserver.started"
Debug: Network Cache Dir:  "/home/fryorcraken/.config/Status/tmp/netcache" (:0, )
Warning: QQuickItem::stackBefore: Cannot stack AccountMenuItemPanel_QMLTYPE_484(0x559f34e39010, parent=0x559f34ba1cd0, geometry=0,0 342x64) before AccountMenuItemPanel_QMLTYPE_484(0x559f349e9100, name = "LoginView_addNewUserItem"), which must be a sibling (:0, )
ERROR[08-22|16:53:45.816] failed to initialize wallet db           package=status-go/api.GethStatusBackend err="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database
ERR 2023-08-22 16:53:45.816+10:00 error:                                     topics="accounts-service" tid=103272 file=service.nim:619 procName=verifyDatabasePassword errDesription="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
ERROR[08-22|16:53:48.348] failed to initialize wallet db           package=status-go/api.GethStatusBackend err="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
ERROR[08-22|16:53:48.348] failed to start a node                   key-uid=0x74c9c15fe362623c55226f9ba674fd9cca46f83c280a0fd75a7d256b0639a390 error="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
ERR 2023-08-22 16:53:48.348+10:00 node.login                                 topics="signals-manager" tid=103272 file=signals_manager.nim:48 error="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
ERR 2023-08-22 16:53:48.352+10:00 login error                                topics="app-controller" tid=103272 file=module.nim:436 methodName=onNodeLogin errDesription="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"

```


### Additional Information

- Status desktop version: StatusIm-Desktop-230821-200320-7274e6-x86_64.AppImage
- Operating System: Fedora Linux
I backed up and deleted  `~/.config/Status` folder to help resort but when initiating the account, it does not find any profile messages on the network.
I see a lot of messages about the wallet DB. @alaibe @IvanBelyakoff do you think you can help?

I've faced the same issue today and already working on it. In short, due to a bug in status-go, wallet db is created sometimes with uppercase password. I am testing the fix right now, but that is for those, who has not upgraded yet. For those, who already upgraded, I think I need a little more time to reencrypt the wallet db to lowercase

> For those, who already upgraded, I think I need a little more time to reencrypt the wallet db to lowercase

Since 0.14 isn't out yet, it's not 100% necessary to have the "migration" IMO. cc @alaibe 

I'll wait to create the RC though until we have the fix for the first part. Can you ping me on the issue/PR when you can @IvanBelyakoff ?

> I backed up and deleted `~/.config/Status` folder to help resort but when initiating the account, it does not find any profile messages on the network.

That one feels unrelated to this bug. @anastasiyaig also complained about it, but for me it did not work on master from CI even before my wallet db PR. But she could not reproduce the issue on her laptop

> > For those, who already upgraded, I think I need a little more time to reencrypt the wallet db to lowercase
> 
> Since 0.14 isn't out yet, it's not 100% necessary to have the "migration" IMO. cc @alaibe
> 
> I'll wait to create the RC though until we have the fix for the first part. Can you ping me on the issue/PR when you can @IvanBelyakoff ?

sure, I will ping you

> > I backed up and deleted `~/.config/Status` folder to help resort but when initiating the account, it does not find any profile messages on the network.
> 
> That one feels unrelated to this bug. @anastasiyaig also complained about it, but for me it did not work on master from CI even before my wallet db PR. But she could not reproduce the issue on her laptop

Yeah that's an other issue, you can disregard it
@jrainville @fryorcraken @alaibe Please review the [PR](https://github.com/status-im/status-go/pull/3934). This one is only for those app setups not migrated to the PR with a wallet database yet.
I agree @jrainville no need to handle migration
For those who already migrated to wallet db PR, the easy fix would be to manually remove wallet.db and restart once this fix is merged

@IvanBelyakoff @jrainville can I have a link to a linux build that contains this fix?

I understand I should delete `wallet.db` in my `config/Status` folder to recover, right?

> @IvanBelyakoff @jrainville can I have a link to a linux build that contains this fix?
> 
> I understand I should delete `wallet.db` in my `config/Status` folder to recover, right?

@fryorcraken you can take a build starting from # 2924  [here](https://ci.infra.status.im/job/status-desktop/job/master/)

You are correct, remove wallet db from your Status folder before running the app from the build.

> > @IvanBelyakoff @jrainville can I have a link to a linux build that contains this fix?
> > I understand I should delete `wallet.db` in my `config/Status` folder to recover, right?
> 
> @fryorcraken you can take a build starting from # 2924 [here](https://ci.infra.status.im/job/status-desktop/job/master/)
> 
> You are correct, remove wallet db from your Status folder before running the app from the build.

There is no such file..

```
~/.config/Status                                                                                                                                                  
▶ find . -name wallet.db

```

Not fixed

```
▶ ~/.local/bin/StatusIm-Desktop-230822-193655-5fb057-x86_64.AppImage 
INFO [08-23|15:02:58.197] Status backend initialized               backend=geth version=0.164.0 commit=86d969727 IpfsGatewayURL=https://ipfs.status.im/
Info: Warning: Ignoring XDG_SESSION_TYPE=wayland on Gnome. Use QT_QPA_PLATFORM=wayland to run on Wayland anyway. (:0, )

INF 2023-08-23 15:02:59.395+10:00 Commit: 5fb057f61                          topics="status-app" tid=196580 file=nim_status_client.nim:190
INF 2023-08-23 15:02:59.395+10:00 Current date:                              topics="status-app" tid=196580 file=nim_status_client.nim:191 currentDateTime=2023-08-23T15:02:59+10:00

INF 2023-08-23 15:03:07.740+10:00 starting application...                    topics="status-app" tid=196580 file=nim_status_client.nim:196
WRN 2023-08-23 15:03:07.745+10:00 Error decoding signal                      topics="signals-manager" tid=196580 file=signals_manager.nim:43 err="Unknown signal received: mediaserver.started"
Warning: QQuickItem::stackBefore: Cannot stack AccountMenuItemPanel_QMLTYPE_2008(0x561c78791c20, parent=0x561c784fc030, geometry=0,0 342x64) before AccountMenuItemPanel_QMLTYPE_2008(0x561c7833b220, name = "LoginView_addNewUserItem"), which must be a sibling (:0, )
ERROR[08-23|15:03:22.998] failed to initialize wallet db           package=status-go/api.GethStatusBackend err="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database
ERR 2023-08-23 15:03:22.998+10:00 error:                                     topics="accounts-service" tid=196580 file=service.nim:619 procName=verifyDatabasePassword errDesription="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
ERROR[08-23|15:03:24.897] failed to initialize wallet db           package=status-go/api.GethStatusBackend err="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
ERROR[08-23|15:03:24.897] failed to start a node                   key-uid=0x74c9c15fe362623c55226f9ba674fd9cca46f83c280a0fd75a7d256b0639a390 error="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
ERR 2023-08-23 15:03:24.908+10:00 node.login                                 topics="signals-manager" tid=196580 file=signals_manager.nim:48 error="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
ERR 2023-08-23 15:03:24.913+10:00 login error                                topics="app-controller" tid=196580 file=module.nim:436 methodName=onNodeLogin errDesription="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
```

Cc @IvanBelyakoff ( I can't reopen the issue)

> Not fixed

@fryorcraken from the log you posted all I can say is it failed on `verifyDatabasePassword` which means either the password is incorrect (could be that you have the uppercase hashed password) or wallet.db is not removed and you have 2 different passswords - uppercase and lowercase for the 2 dbs. Have you tried to open the dbs manually from command line and confirm the password?
@fryorcraken Is the problem still reproducible for you?
